basic.description: This course examines three main questions: (1) Can we explain the existence of our earth, and the universe as a while, without recourse to God? (2) Can there be an objective moral code that we all have good reason to follow even if there is no God? (3) Can we have a spiritual or religious attitude to the world in the absence of belief in God?
basic.subject: IFS
basic.title: World Without God?
